dict.string: Getting ready to develop iOS apps…takes some preparation.…Apple is strict about hardware and software requirements…for your developer devices.…If you don't set up correctly,…you won't even be able to compile your Xamarin app,…much less test it on your new devices
This is fun and lets you learn about the process.…If you are serious about distributing or selling your apps,…you really should consider buying at least one iOS device

Learn how to create the neccessary sign certificates and mobile provisioning files needed by Apache Cordova and PhoneGap in order to create development and deployment versions of your mobile applciation.

Getting ready to develop iOS apps…takes some preparation.…Apple is strict about hardware and software requirements…for your developer devices.…If you don't set up correctly,…you won't even be able to compile your Xamarin app,…much less test it on your new devices
This is fun and lets you learn about the process.…If you are serious about distributing or selling your apps,…you really should consider buying at least one iOS device
This course is designed to help you get started building apps for mobile devices that run the Android operating system.

Android mobile app development in Dreamweaver is available for both Mac and Windows users.…You'll need Mac 10.5.8 or later and if you're on Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7. Android mobile app development in Dreamweaver is available for both Mac and Windows users.…You'll need Mac 10.5.8 or later and if you're on Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7.
This course shows you how to create datacentric apps for Android devices, using SQLite, Java, and the built-in android.database packages.
Android mobile app development in Dreamweaver is available for both Mac and Windows users.…You'll need Mac 10.5.8 or later and if you're on Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7.
This course shows you how to create datacentric apps for Android devices, using SQLite, Java, and the built-in android.database packages.
PhoneGap and its open-source sister Apache Cordova simplify cross-platform app development. You can code an app once, and then compile it to run anywhere: iOS, Android, or Windows Phone.

See how PhoneGap, an open-source framework, and PhoneGap Build, a service in the Adobe Creative Cloud, allow you to create cross-platform mobile apps using the web technologies you know and love: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

PhoneGap Build is the cloud-based version, which allows you to take apps built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and compile them into native, store-ready mobile apps. All without any SDKs. PhoneGap Build is the cloud-based version, which allows you to take apps built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and compile them into native, store-ready mobile apps. All without any SDKs.
PhoneGap and its open-source sister Apache Cordova simplify cross-platform app development. You can code an app once, and then compile it to run anywhere: iOS, Android, or Windows Phone.
